name: Achi (itch)
description:
Info

Achi is a two player game from Ghana it is very similar to tic tac toe. The objective of the game is to get a line of three pieces of your color, this line can be horizontal, vertical, or diagonal.

The short explanation is it is tic tac toe but you only have three pieces and once you have play all of them you can move them along the lines of the board.

How To Play

White plays first (Tip: To figure out who's turn it is look at the background color)

players take turns placing their pieces on the board until all 6 pieces are placed.

Then players take turns moving one of their pieces to try and get a line of 3 pieces.

If a player can not move a piece they must click the skip button.
